summary: An Ordinance providing for the refund of fifty-one & 22/100 ($51.22) Charles La Chapelle, for the purpose of reimbursing him in a like sum which he paid in the redemption of Lot seven (7), Block twenty-one (21), Eden Addition No. 2, which property was sold for the condemnation of Seventh Avenue North, under authority of Ordinance No. 8269 on April 15, 1903, as evidenced by Treasurer's receipt No. C-9233.
